jcr:content.text: Today's web frontend frameworks allow us to render pages on the device instead of the server. Leveraging client side rendering allows us to transfer only the content when a client clicks from one page to another resulting in a faster page transition and offloading a vast amount of work that is traditionally done on the server to the web browser.
